entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
